channel.title: Can somebody help me?
channel.description:
so yes im using teamtorva package and im looking for a good coder wich would like to help me. i know some basic edtiting and stuff but and i dont know how to add stuff suchs as npcs and new shops.
would someone please help me? :I

item.title: Can somebody help me?
item.dc:creator: @ownedin3d ownedin3d
item.description:
@ownedin3d wrote:

Storm Powner:

dude i have the same package i get sometimes erros but just deleted it, i added stuff like total in game play time, hans give you a vet cape, torva with hp boost (hp bar is glitched now ). and more stuff. you just need to find good tuts use google, btw try google.com their guides are much better, not advertising

Thanks for your help, i’d try look up some tuts and see if i get along with them.

Read full topic

item.title: Can somebody help me?
item.dc:creator: @Hot_Potato1 Hot_Potato
item.description:
@Hot_Potato1 wrote:

[quote=“ownedin3d, post:8, topic:440030”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=542712.msg3977888#msg3977888 date=1334879667]

I appreciate guys, its not exactly what im looking for, im looking for a guy wich would like to do it.

Why can’t you do it?
[/quote]
because i can’t add stuf such as Dragon claws or ags, or new sprites etc.[/quote]
Yes but you learn. It wouldn’t be fair if the coder you find (doubt you would) gets less credit.

Read full topic

item.title: Can somebody help me?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“ownedin3d, post:8, topic:440030”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=542712.msg3977888#msg3977888 date=1334879667]

I appreciate guys, its not exactly what im looking for, im looking for a guy wich would like to do it.

Why can’t you do it?
[/quote]
because i can’t add stuf such as Dragon claws or ags, or new sprites etc.[/quote]

Yes but no one here is just going to do it for you. The’re going to tell you to learn and do it yourself, and that’s what you SHOULD do anyways.

item.title: Can somebody help me?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

ownedin3d:

I appreciate guys, its not exactly what im looking for, im looking for a guy wich would like to do it.

No requesting 'coders', hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.
All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, 'coder'/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.
We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Read full topic
